days.introduction:
*Welcome to the Ocean Challenge.*
Today, we will explore the wonders and challenges of our vast oceans. Get ready for an immersive journey into the depths of the sea!

messages.content: Did you know that the ocean covers more than 70% of the Earth's surface? It is home to a great diversity of marine life and plays a crucial role in regulating the planet's climate. Let's dive in and learn more about this fascinating ecosystem!

options.text: Watch a documentary about marine life and the importance of ocean conservation.
Take a photo or create a drawing that represents the beauty of the ocean.
Research and share an interesting fact about a marine species

days.title: Exploring the Ocean

days.introduction:
*Welcome to the second day of the Ocean Challenge.*
Today, we will focus on the challenges facing our oceans and how we can contribute to their conservation.

messages.content: The ocean is facing numerous threats, including pollution, overfishing, and climate change. It's time for us to take action and protect this precious resource for future generations.

options.text: Take part in a beach cleanup or organize one in your community.
Share an infographic or article about the impact of plastic pollution on marine life.
Reduce your plastic consumption by using reusable products and recycling properly.

days.title: Conserving the Ocean
